ygData.subject: RE: Sonorus clouding and Undead
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmmm, I will have to give this a try in Lower Guk.  I really need to learn that place better. Sylly ... From:	Jason Rochelle [mailto:Jasroc@home.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Hmmm, I will have to give this a try in Lower Guk. I really need to learn
that place better.

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Jason Rochelle [mailto:Jasroc@...]
Sent: Saturday, December 04, 1999 4:27 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Sonorus clouding and Undead

From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>

When I frist got sonorous clouding I read that it sometimes
affected
undead, and I think there was a debate over this on this
newsgroup.
Today, I was in unrest and I can confirm that Sonorous
Clouding DID make
me invisible to Undead, at level 33.
